meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. You already learned that 降りる means "to get off." This is when you're helping something else descend down from something, not when you yourself are getting down. So it means <vocabulary>to take down</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to lower</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi reading, which you already learned. Go you!
